name: sleekness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being smooth, shiny, and lying close to the body, and therefore looking well cared for; the quality of not being untidy and having no parts sticking out: This dryer was powerful and fast and gave hair sleekness and body. The goggles hug the eyes, giving a feeling of athletic sleekness.
the quality of being modern and fashionable, especially in a way that is simple and clean: Most of the polluting factories have gone, replaced by hi-tech sleekness and eco-friendly modernity. We take enormous pride in the sleekness and simplicity of our website. See
sleek
